```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

 
```{r}
data("ny_noaa")

noaa =
 ny_noaa %>%
 select(id,date, prcp, snow) %>%
  filter(
    id == "US1NYAB0001"
  ) %>% 
drop_na(snow, prcp)
```
